main event: A civilian observed a bright ball of light transitioning into a spinning disc that seemed to explode before disappearing, observed in Austin, Texas on November 25, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2 minutes,The object moved steadily northwest at high speed without leaving a trail,At a certain point, the object was described as spinning clockwise,The object appeared as a bright light when first seen, concluding it was 'possible' that it was an extraterrestrial craft.
sighted object: a ball of light transitioning to a spinning disc
